amendment.description: To make a technical correction relating to the Science, Mathematics, and Research for Transformation (SMART) Defense Education Program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1320 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1320 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S8543-8544; text: CR S8544) To make a technical correction relating to the Science, Mathematics, and Research for Transformation (SMART) Defense Education Program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1320 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1320 proposed by Senator Warner.
